title.zh: 上海：共赋未来·创益大会
title.en: Shanghai: Co-Empowering the Future · Innovation for Good Conference

description.zh: 「共赋未来·创益大会」由上海益优青年服务中心主办。血友姐妹会负责人左钰洁作分享，向与会的公益组织和青年代表介绍血友病女性关爱项目的创新实践和发展经验。这次大会为不同领域的公益项目提供了交流平台，促进了公益创新理念的传播和实践经验的分享。
description.en: The 'Co-Empowering the Future · Innovation for Good Conference' was hosted by Shanghai Yiyou Youth Service Center. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, gave a presentation, introducing the innovative practices and development experiences of the hemophilia women's care project to participating public welfare organizations and youth representatives. This conference provided an exchange platform for public welfare projects in different fields, promoting the dissemination of public welfare innovation concepts and the sharing of practical experiences.
